txt.en: Erchar can be found in Linhir in eastern Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nYou have defeated the Half-troll, Anbúrz, and should now return to Erchar.
Roving Threat: Anbúrz, Wielder of Men
The Half-troll, Anbúrz, has been sighted throughout Dor-en-Ernil and poses a constant threat to its people.

'You have done a great thing in defeating that vicious Half-troll, [placeholder]. His bloodlust struck fear into many of our people, and they shall rest far easier with him gone.\n\n'Thank you, my friend.'
Anbúrz can be found somewhere in Dor-en-Ernil.\n\nErchar has asked you to track and defeat the brutal Half-troll, Anbúrz.

'My men have heard terrifying rumours of a great Half-troll known as Anbúrz in Dor-en-Ernil.

'It is said that he is strong enough to swing a man as one would swing a mace. I know not if such boasts can be true, but if they are, we have much to fear.

'We do not know where he has made camp this day, but I would ask that you gather your allies and seek him out. I shall await your safe return, my friend.'
Find and defeat Anbúrz in Dor-en-Ernil
